Odkrijte svoj simbol
V vsakem je poleg skritega pomena zelo veliko energije. Ustvarite svojega, uporabite njegovo moč in okrepite svojo namero.
07 Nov 2019, 11:27 by M. B. Z.



Srce kot znamenje ljubezni je eden najpogosteje uporabljenih simbolov v popularni kulturi. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images



Dobro premislite, kateri simbol si tetovirate, saj vas bo njegov energijski odtis dolgo spremljal. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images


Simbol je znak, ki presega svoj prvotni pomen in vsebuje dodatno vrednost ter poseben smisel. Tako na primer rdeča zastava na plaži pomeni, da je kopanje prepovedano zaradi nevarnih valov. Simboli, ki so običajno slikovni, se pogosto pojavljajo tudi v sodobni družbi. Primer simbola, ki se je ohranil stoletja, je riba, starodavni simbol krščanstva.Izhaja še iz časov, ko so se kristjani skrivali pred Rimljani in se med sabo prepoznavali z določenim skrivnim znamenjem. Tisti, ki niso poznali njihovega simbola, so ga prepoznali samo kot ribo, kristjani pa so vedeli, da v njihovi skupnosti riba predstavlja Jezusa, s čimer ga simbolično označujemo še danes.Simboli imajo lahko močan ezoterični pomen, saj je v njih zbrana energija, ki predstavlja njihov pomen. Če so pogosto uporabljeni, se ta še dodatno okrepi. To ne pomeni le, da bodite previdni, ko jih rišete na svoje predmete, stene doma ali si jih tetovirate: poučite se o njihovem pomenu, saj vas bo njihov energijski odtis spremljal, čeprav ga ne poznate.


Dobro premislite, kateri simbol si tetovirate, saj vas bo njegov energijski odtis dolgo spremljal. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images

Po drugi strani si lahko pomagate tako, da ustvarite svoj simbol, ki bo nosilec določene energije in pomena ter bo okrepil vaše namere. Sploh ni nujno, da gre za simbol, ki ga boste delili s skupino ljudi, ki jim zaupate – lahko je samo vaš.Uporabljate ga lahko ob svojem imenu, da izpostavite tiste odlike, ki jih predstavlja. Z njim lahko zaznamujete svojo lastnino, ga narišete na rob rokovnika, ga nosite pri sebi kot talisman ali v denarnici, če želite njegovo pomoč oziroma njegove odlike priklicati v svoje življenje. S prijateljicami, sodelavci ali v družinskem krogu ga lahko uporabljate kot skrivno znamenje za različne reči. Z njim si lahko sporočite, da vam je kdo všeč ali ne, ali ga samo narišete v vsako medsebojno sporočilo kot znamenje zavezništva in prijateljstva, skupnosti med vami, kar vas bo energijsko dodatno povezalo.Eden izmed starodavnih simbolov, ki ga morda lahko izberete zase, je spirala oziroma ovijajoča se kača, ki ima zelo globok pomen: predstavlja proces rasti skozi preobrazbo. Tako kot kača menja kožo, se prelevi in na novo zaživi, tudi vas naporna izkušnja ne ubije, ampak okrepi. Iz pepela vstanete močnejši in odločnejši kot prej. Podobno Luna velja za simbol materinstva, nežnosti, čustev, skritega. Izbirate lahko tudi med živalskimi simboli, prašič denimo predstavlja obilje, bogastvo, srečo, sova modrost, lev dostojanstvo, ponos, moč. Mačka je simbol skrivnostnosti, magije, skritega čarobnega znanja – že Egipčani so jih izbrali za svete živali in jih častili.Labod je znamenje elegance, plemenitosti, čistosti, metulj preobrazbe, čebela pa delavnosti in marljivosti. Dvojna sekira je simbol ženske moči in matriarhata, še posebno je uveljavljena v minojski kulturi s Krete, enako kot so posode in sklede vseh vrst, ki so jih uporabljali za prenašanje hrane, shranjevanje olja in varjenje napitkov, simbol ženskosti in ženske moči. Voda v vseh oblikah je simbol čustvenosti, ženskosti, materinstva, nežnosti, čistosti, obilja, školjke so simbol Venere, pajkove mreže so tkanina, ki predstavlja življenje.Vzorci v obliki črke x predstavljajo štiri elemente, krogi in spirale so znak večnega rojevanja in preporoda.Ni treba, da upoštevate zgornje predloge, zamislite si lahko čisto svoje znamenje s svojim pomenom. Vzemite si čas, da vaš simbol sam pride do vas – morda kot oblika, ki jo nenehno opažate okoli sebe, morda podoba, ki slučajno nastane, ko čečkate po papirju. Lahko je nekaj, kar se pojavi v sanjah ali meditaciji.Lahko se vam v mislih pojavi simbol, s katerim ste imeli opravka v preteklem življenju. Bodite pozorni na naključja in bodite prepričani, da je vaš znak nekaj, kar v sebi skriva pomen, globoko povezan z vašim življenjem.

Discover your symbol
There is a lot of energy in addition to the hidden meaning. Create your own, use its power and strengthen your intention.
07 Nov 2019, 11:27 by M. B. Z.



The heart as a sign of love is one of the most commonly used symbols in popular culture. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images



Think carefully about which symbol you are tattooing, as its energy footprint will accompany you for a long time. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images


A symbol is a character that goes beyond its original meaning and contains additional value and special meaning. For example, a red flag on the beach means that swimming is prohibited due to dangerous waves. Symbols, which are usually pictorial, often appear in modern society. An example of a symbol that has survived for centuries is fish, an ancient symbol of Christianity. It dates back to the times when Christians hid from the Romans and identified themselves with a certain secret sign. Those who did not know their symbol only recognized it as a fish, and Christians knew that in their community, fish represents Jesus, symbolically marking it today. representing their meaning. If used frequently, this is further enhanced. This not only means being careful when painting them on your objects, walls at home, or tattooing them: Learn about their meaning, as their energy footprint will accompany you even though you do not know it.


Think carefully about which symbol you are tattooing, as its energy footprint will accompany you for a long time. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images

On the other hand, you can help yourself to create your own symbol that will carry a certain energy and meaning and reinforce your intentions. It doesn't even have to be a symbol to share with a group of people you trust - it can only be yours. You can use it with your name to highlight the qualities it represents. With it you can mark your property, draw it on the edge of your diary, carry it with you as a talisman or in your wallet to invoke his help or his qualities in your life. You can use it with your friends, coworkers or family circle as a secret marker for different things. It can be used to let you know whether you like it or not, or just draw it into each other's message as a sign of an alliance and friendship, a community between you, which will further energize you. One of the ancient symbols you can choose for yourself , is a spiral or twisting snake that has a very deep meaning: it represents the process of growth through transformation. Just as a snake changes its skin, it changes and revives itself, so the strenuous experience does not kill you, but strengthen it. You rise from the ashes stronger and more determined than before. Similarly, the moon is considered a symbol of motherhood, tenderness, emotions, hidden. You can also choose from animal symbols, for example, a pig represents abundance, wealth, happiness, owl wisdom, lion dignity, pride, power. The cat is a symbol of mystery, magic, hidden magical knowledge - the Egyptians have already chosen them as sacred animals and worshiped them. Swan is a sign of elegance, nobility, purity, a butterfly of transformation, and a bee of diligence and diligence. The double ax is a symbol of feminine power and matriarchy, and is especially well-established in Minoan culture from Crete, the same as containers and bowls of all kinds used to carry food, store oil, and brew beverages, a symbol of femininity and feminine power. Water in all its forms is a symbol of emotion, femininity, motherhood, tenderness, purity, abundance, shells are a symbol of Venus, spider webs are a fabric that represents life. .You do not have to follow the suggestions above, you can imagine your own brand with its meaning. Take the time for your symbol to reach you - perhaps as a form that you constantly notice around you, perhaps an image that accidentally arises when you scroll through the paper. It can be something that appears in a dream or meditation. It may come to your mind a symbol that you have dealt with in a past life. Keep an eye out for coincidences and make sure that your sign is something that hides a meaning deeply connected to your life.
